text:
I have to do following task, I wanted to write macro for it...

Converting this:
```@res begin
   r1 = 12
   r2 = 15
   r3 = 78
end```
Into :
```r1 = imp(12)
r2 = imp(15)
r3 = imp(78)```
Assume `imp`  is `struct` ...
Can someone help me to solve this ?
